segments.text: Look at the show on TV . I am watching a food show at a very famous seafood restaurant . I really want to eat at that restaurant . I am a seafood lover .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Speaking of seafood , my mouth is watering . Let's go to the seafood restaurant in our neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the crystal clear fridge . You can see so many kinds of seafood in it . They all look very fresh and delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True . I would like to have some salmon sashimi and a roast salmon head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You sound like a seafood expert . I would like to have some stir-fried squids and steamed shrimps .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are not too bad as well . I also want to have a steamed lobster . It is really taste like heaven .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go into the restaurant and find a table to order some food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait . Let me tell the lady what we would like to order in front of the seafood fridge first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will wait for you inside the restaurant
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think we should try some deep fried oysters ?
segments.speaker: S1
